description: This test verifies the continuity of equipotential bonding between the module frame and accessible conductive parts. It ensures that protective grounding connections are adequate to prevent electric shock hazards and provide a safe path for fault currents.

max_overcurrent_protection.description: Maximum overcurrent protection device rating for the module

test_current.description: Test current shall be 2.5 times the maximum overcurrent protection rating

test_duration.description: Duration for which the test current is applied

voltage_limit.description: Maximum allowable voltage drop during test

max_resistance.description: Maximum allowable resistance for equipotential bonding

measurements.name: voltage_drop
measurements.description: Voltage drop measured across the bonding connection under test current

measurements.name: measured_resistance
measurements.description: Calculated resistance from voltage drop and test current (R = V / I)

measurements.name: test_current_actual
measurements.description: Actual test current applied during the test

pass_criteria.description: Test must be conducted for at least 120 seconds
Actual test current must be within ±5% of calculated test current

procedure.action: Verify that the module is disconnected from all power sources and grounded
procedure.safety_note: Use lockout/tagout procedures to ensure no power is present

procedure.action: Record ambient temperature and relative humidity
Identify all accessible conductive parts that should be bonded to the module frame
procedure.expected_result: All bonding points identified and documented

procedure.action: Clean all test contact points to ensure good electrical connection
procedure.expected_result: Contact surfaces free of oxidation and contamination

procedure.action: Connect ground continuity tester positive terminal to module frame ground point
Connect ground continuity tester negative terminal to accessible conductive part under test
Calculate test current as 2.5 times the maximum overcurrent protection rating
Set ground continuity tester to calculated test current

procedure.safety_note: Monitor for signs of overheating or arcing

procedure.action: Measure and record voltage drop across the bonding connection
Calculate resistance using Ohm's law: R = V / I
Compare measured resistance against pass criteria (≤ 0.1 Ω)
Repeat test for all additional bonding points
Document all results and generate test report
